specialtyDrinks.name: Cucumber Mint Lemonade
specialtyDrinks.description: Freshly Squeezed Lemonade with cucumber slices, mint leaves, etc.

specialtyDrinks.name: Rose Cardamom Hot Chocolate
specialtyDrinks.description: Rich hot chocolate infused with rosewater and cardamom, topped with whipped cream

soupsSalads.name: Citrusy Chickpea Salad
soupsSalads.description: Flavorful combination of spiced chickpea, turmeric rice, roasted sweet potatoes, and coconut yogurt drizzle

soupsSalads.name: Thai Coconut Curry Soup
soupsSalads.description: Spicy and Creamy with coconut milk, lemongrass, tofu, mushrooms, and lime

appetizers.name: Mac N' Cheese Bites
appetizers.description: Made with sharp cheddar and deep-fried for a crispy exterior

appetizers.name: Red Pepper Bruschetta
appetizers.description: A platter featuring roasted red pepper feta and tomato basil topped with lemon zest

appetizers.name: Asian Rice Wraps
appetizers.description: Sauteed vegetables, tofu, sesame-ginger sauce, and butter lettuce wrapped in Asian rice wrap

entrees.name: Wild Mushroom Risotto
entrees.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with medley of wild mushrooms, white wine, Parmesan, and fresh thyme

entrees.name: Mediterranean Street Bowl
entrees.description: Quinoa or farro topped with roasted vegetables chickpeas tzatziki, and a drizzle of tahini dressing

entrees.name: Paneer Tikka Pizza
entrees.description: Authentic Naan Bread topped with creamy cheese sauce, paneer cubes, and tikka seasoned olive oil

desserts.name: Rosewater Panna Cotta w/ Pistachio Crumble
desserts.description: Silky panna cotta infused with rosewater, topped with vibrant pistachio crumbles and pomegranate syrup

desserts.name: Earl Grey Crème Brûlée
desserts.description: Creamy Custard infused with earl grey tea, topped with a crisp caramelized sugar crust
